item.description: Meet local French language and culture lovers for conversation and fun! For the francophones it's a great way to meet other fluent French Speakers. Students of French can practice; build your vocabulary and finally figure out those verb conjugations! We welcome all ages and levels. We have a great group of people attending our group includes native French Speakers to beginners. Thanks to all for coming and participating. Venez vous joindre Ã  nous pour rencontrer d'autres personnes qui parlent francais.
item.how_to_find_us: We have a table sign, listen for the French, look for a happy, laughing, interesting group

group.name: The Providence French Language Meetup Group
